title: KEEPS REFRESHING 🔄
comment: I would of liked👍 it if it actually worked. I refreshed it 3x. Then uninstalled & reinstalled twice. Still not working. Unfortunately, I had to uninstall.                    moto g | Motorola (2013) v4.4.4
Translucent bars would look awesome 5 stars when you do it!

Hi Aron van de Pol !

We really do appreciate your suggestion! Here is a screenshot of our development version http://i.imgur.com/pXCKRSu.png If this new feature suits your request, it will hit the play store with the next update =)

Have a nice day,

TVBarthel's team.

title: location issue
comment: i enabled high accuracy but it still says enable location. I am using cyanogenmod 11 on i9300

Hi Orçun, our application only uses the last known location of your phone, it doesn't ask to update your location (for battery saving, privacy and lower permission). You can try to use an app that set your location, it might resolve your prroblem. Please keep us posted on this issue! Have a nice day, TVBarthel's team.
